knowledge_panel.description: virgin games is a company that provides online gambling services, predominantly in the united kingdom, that licences the brand from sir richard branson's virgin enterprises.the company was established in late 2003 by virgin group. in 2013 the company was acquired by gamesys for an undisclosed sum. wikipedia
